Profesional Services Sectors

Details On Recently Completed Projects

These projects all reflect the passion I have for professional delivery. The projects presented here are in different sectors including Data Analytics, Professional Services, Business Analyses & Design, Web App Development and Python scripting

Data & business Analytics Project: Student Retention

In January of 2020 I got contracted by a company in the education sector to conduct a research project with the wide project scope of identifying the reason/reasons for low student retention rates. After a prelim investigation a hypothesis was drafted stating that bad student grades was most likely the biggest driver of low student retention. Thousands of data-points were gathered, and the hypothesis was proven with a strong level of confidence. Thanks to algoritms based analyses, further very interesting patterns were identified in the data. The company has since implemented several measures based on my findings.

Automated Data Extraction

The brief for this assignment was simple, however the solution was not. The company utilized a management system that carried all of their data. Due to a change in operating procedures, the need arose to issue individual customer statements. The system could not do this, and we could only extract raw data in pdf format. We had no access to the data banks directly. I developed a Python script that extracted the finance data from PDF files and generated individual statements. This project had a high level of complexity and also presented a steep learning curve.

Royal Bafokeng Development Project

I was lead project manager on this 27 million rand community upliftment initiative. The project saw great success in partnership with Royal Bafokeng Platinum, with 300 unemployed beneficiaries being trained in a combination of hard-skill accredited programs. The project concluded with the placement of 288 beneficiaries in workplaces linked to mining activities. I was also responsible for sourcing of the project funds, in addition to the operational management of the project.

Data Analytics: Financial Markets

In January 2020 I was contracted by a prominent proprietary fund to assist in data analytics projects aimed at financial markets. As lead of data analytics, I am mainly responsible for testing hypothesis developed by in-house economists and financial traders and determining the viability and risks associated with the implementation of related strategies. Furthermore, I am also responsible in identifying complimentary trends in the data and advise on possible previous unseen implications and opportunities. I am proud to say that during my work with the proprietary fund I manged to identify trends and prove hypothesis previously completely unknown to the academic world, and I am now in the process of publishing my findings.

Web App Development

In partnership with a senior JS developer, we developed Rabit Chat: A rolete video chat service that randomly partner users and place them into a video chat room together. This awesome app was developed using Redux for state management and hosted with google firebase. During the nationwide lock-down I also assisted restuarant owners by developing an online order system in vanilla JS that was free for use. Currently, I am busy developing a fully functional MIS for a company that will be able to automate operational activities, invoicing and generation of monthly management reports.

Financial Analytics: Machine Learning

As part of my portfolio as lead of data analytics with the proprietary fund I developed a basic Machine Learning algorithm that analysis several data points and determines a profit / loss probability on a specific trade before the trader places the trade. This is utilized as an additional guidance tool given to traders to attempt to mitigate risk factors

How Can I Add Value?

  • A unique mix of skills and qualifications bringing together a firm understanding of leadership principals, financial & project management, Data Science and Software Development.
  • Strong communication and management skills
  • Experienced in complex relationship management
  • Passion for Software Development (JS & Python) and Data Analytics
  • Ability to identify relevant data sources within a business, design and action appropriate data analytics projects (CRISP-DM), conduct relevant statistical modelling & communicate results in an effective and business relevant manner.
  • Ability to see the bigger picture and identify opportunities beyond the immediate business environment
  • Ability to effectively research and present opportunities
  • Practical application of effective leadership methodologies within a business environment
  • Build professional proposals and present to clients
  • Significant experience in successfully tendering for projects & programs
  • Aligning operations with project deliverables ensuring on-time tranche payments are realized
  • Organization-wide budgeting
